subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: Leo Nunez took a shutout into the fifth inning in his first career start, outpitching the 15-year veteran Tim Wakefield last night to help the visiting Kansas City Royals defeat the Boston Red Sox, 9-3.
snippet: Leo Nunez took a shutout into the fifth inning in his first career start, outpitching the 15-year veteran Tim Wakefield last night to help the visiting Kansas City Royals defeat the Boston Red Sox, 9-3.
